## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G22140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G22140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EBS</u>
- **Gene Name:** EARLY BOLTING IN SHORT DAYS
- **Description:**   PHD finger family protein / bromo-adjacent homology (BAH) domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2120693
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
